title: 04/20/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/20/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP opens with a recap of Steph Curry's 49 point performance against the Sixers. Should he be getting more MVP buzz? Continuing in the first hour, Chris Simms joins the show in the first hour to talk about the team he is most intrigued by as well as what other teams could make some noise in next week’s draft. This week, soccer stole the headlines with the potential of a Super League forming across the pond. NBC Sports soccer host Rebecca Lowe explains how there is reason to be concerned if this league gains traction.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
